moves.1. c4: Definitely not one of my best games, I would appreciate any thoughts on where I may have done better
moves.1... e5: I've been experimenting with the English opening recently and decided to have a go with that
moves.2. g3 Nc6 3. Nc3 f5 4. Bg2 Nf6 5. e3: This seems a bit passive but it was to give my g1 knight somewhere to go to, I didn't like the idea of Nf3,e4 and from e2 it could support e4
moves.5... g6 6. Nge2 Bg7 7. d4 d6 8. Nd5 O-O: Chasing away the bishop which could get annoying if allowed to stay there.
moves.12. Bg2 c6 13. b4 g5: This seemed a little risky to me but as my opponent was around 200 points north of my rating I guess he felt he didn't have to worry too much
What I was trying to do here was to get the black king a bit more exposed.
I decided not to exchange but I'm still not sure it was the right decision
moves.27... Nd2 28. Rb2: pretty much forced due to the fork threat on b3
moves.28... Nf3+ 29. Kh1: I didn't like the look of Kf1 was this a mistake?
moves.29... Ne1 30. Rd2: Looking to reduce blacks attacking force before its too late.
moves.30... Nxg2 31. Rxd8+ Qxd8 32. Kxg2 Qd5+: The final blunder, probably f3 was better
moves.33... Qh1+:
Time for me to resign.

Please comment.
